column1: create view INFI_Costs_SSAS_CSC2.V_FactActualCost_Short_G0 as SELECT [YearMonthCreation], [PostingPeriodYearId], IIF([PostingPeriodId]>12,12,[PostingPeriodId]) AS [PostingPeriodId], [SourceSystem], [DocumentWasReversed], [CostCenterDimId], [CostElementDimId], REPLACE([JunkDimID],'_ACT','') AS [JunkDimID], [SourceCostCenterDimId], [TotalAmountCOAreaCurrency] = SUM([TotalAmountCOAreaCurrency]), [FixedAmountCOAreaCurrency] = SUM([FixedAmountCOAreaCurrency]), [VariableAmountCOAreaCurrency] = SUM([VariableAmountCOAreaCurrency]), [TotalAmountObjectCurrency] = SUM([TotalAmountObjectCurrency]), [FixedAmountObjectCurrency] = SUM([FixedAmountObjectCurrency]), [VariableAmountObjectCurrency] = SUM([VariableAmountObjectCurrency]) FROM [INFM_Costs_CSC1].[CO_CostActual_PerFact_G0] Group By [YearMonthCreation], [PostingPeriodYearId], [PostingPeriodId], [SourceSystem], [DocumentWasReversed], [CostCenterDimId], [CostElementDimId], [JunkDimID], [SourceCostCenterDimId]

create view INFI_CIVS_CSC1.V_Plant_V1_IDIM1 as SELECT DISTINCT [Plant_BK], [Description] FROM [RAWV_RB_CSC1].[Plant_WHUB0] AS PH LEFT JOIN [RAWV_RB_CSC1].[PlantDescription_WSATM_M2_X] AS PS ON PH.[Plant_HK] = PS.[Plant_HK] AND PS.[LanguageCode] = 'EN' AND PS.[LoadEndDate] = '2999-12-31 00:00:00.0000000' WHERE [Plant_BK] <> ''

create view INFI_Costs_SSAS_CSC2.V_FactActualCost_Short_G0 as SELECT [YearMonthCreation], [PostingPeriodYearId], IIF([PostingPeriodId]>12,12,[PostingPeriodId]) AS [PostingPeriodId], [SourceSystem], [DocumentWasReversed], [CostCenterDimId], [CostElementDimId], REPLACE([JunkDimID],'_ACT','') AS [JunkDimID], [SourceCostCenterDimId], [TotalAmountCOAreaCurrency] = SUM([TotalAmountCOAreaCurrency]), [FixedAmountCOAreaCurrency] = SUM([FixedAmountCOAreaCurrency]), [VariableAmountCOAreaCurrency] = SUM([VariableAmountCOAreaCurrency]), [TotalAmountObjectCurrency] = SUM([TotalAmountObjectCurrency]), [FixedAmountObjectCurrency] = SUM([FixedAmountObjectCurrency]), [VariableAmountObjectCurrency] = SUM([VariableAmountObjectCurrency]) FROM [INFM_Costs_CSC1].[CO_CostActual_PerFact_G0] Group By [YearMonthCreation], [PostingPeriodYearId], [PostingPeriodId], [SourceSystem], [DocumentWasReversed], [CostCenterDimId], [CostElementDimId], [JunkDimID], [SourceCostCenterDimId]

create view INFI_Costs_CDP_CSC2.V_INTF_CDP_CostActual_V2_IFCT0_D4 as SELECT fact.[SourceSystem] AS [SourceSystem], fact.[FiscalYear] AS [FiscalYear], fact.[PostingPeriod] AS [Period], fact.[DocumentDate] AS [DocumentDate], fact.[ValueType] AS [ValueType], fact.[CompanyCode_BK] AS [CompanyCode], fact.[ControllingArea_BK] AS [ControllingArea], fact.[CostElementId_BK] AS [CostElement], fact.[CostCenterId_BK] AS [CostCenter], fact.[ActivityType_BK] AS [ActivityType], fact.[PartnerCostCenterId_BK] AS [PartnerCostCenter], fact.[PartnerObjectActivityType_BK] AS [PartnerActivityType], fact.[COBusinessTransaction] AS [COBusinessTransaction], 'NULL' AS [BusinessDivision], fact.[Plant_BK] AS [Plant], fact.[SAPDebitCreditIndicator] AS [DebitCreditIndicator], fact.[DebitCreditIndicator] AS [DebitCreditPostings], fact.[UnitOfMeasure] AS [UnitOfMeasure], fact.[ObjectCurrencyCode] AS [ObjectCurrencyCode], fact.[COAreaCurrencyCode] AS [ControllingAreaCurrencyCode], fact.[TransactionCurrencyCode] AS [TransactionCurrencyCode], SUM(fact.[TotalAmountObjectCurrency]) AS [TotalAmountInObjectCurrency], SUM(fact.[TotalAmountCOAreaCurrency]) AS [TotalAmountInControllingAreaCurrency], SUM(fact.[TotalAmountTransactionCurrency]) AS [TotalAmountInTransactionCurrency], SUM(fact.[FixedAmountCOAreaCurrency]) AS [FixedAmountInControllingAreaCurrency], SUM(fact.[TotalPriceVarianceAmountCOAreaCurrency]) AS [TotalPriceVarianceAmountInControllingAreaCurrency], SUM(fact.[FixedPriceVarianceAmountCOAreaCurrency]) AS [FixedPriceVarianceAmountInControllingAreaCurrency], SUM(fact.[TotalQuantity]) AS [TotalQuantity], SUM(fact.[FixedQuantity]) AS [FixedQuantity] FROM [INFM_Costs_CSC1].[COCostActual_V2_MFCT0_D4] fact INNER JOIN [INFI_Costs_CDP_CSC2].[V_RefCDPCompanyCodeDriver_WREF0] ref_cc_filter on ref_cc_filter.[Code] = fact.[CompanyCode_BK] GROUP BY fact.[SourceSystem], fact.[ControllingArea_BK], fact.[FiscalYear], fact.[PostingPeriod], fact.[DocumentDate], fact.[CostElementId_BK], fact.[CostCenterId_BK], fact.[ActivityType_BK], fact.[PartnerCostCenterId_BK], fact.[PartnerObjectActivityType_BK], fact.[CompanyCode_BK], fact.[Plant_BK], fact.[ValueType], fact.[COBusinessTransaction], fact.[UnitOfMeasure], fact.[SAPDebitCreditIndicator], fact.[DebitCreditIndicator], fact.[COAreaCurrencyCode], fact.[TransactionCurrencyCode], fact.[ObjectCurrencyCode]
